title: Farm and Ranch Fencing for Sanford and Fayetteville | RWF Home Improvements
description: Secure your livestock and define your property with durable farm and ranch fencing from RWF Home Improvements. Split rail, woven wire, and custom gates in Fayetteville, Sanford, and Lillington.
keywords: Farm Fencing, Ranch Fencing, Livestock Fencing, Split Rail Fence, Woven Wire Fence, Horse Fencing, Fayetteville Fencing, Sanford Fencing

serviceOptions.title: Split Rail Fencing
serviceOptions.description: A rustic, open design that blends seamlessly with natural landscapes while effective for marking boundaries and containing horses or cattle.

serviceOptions.title: Woven Wire Fencing
serviceOptions.description: Ideal for securing smaller livestock and keeping predators out. High-tensile wire options available for added strength.

serviceOptions.title: Vinyl Ranch Fencing
serviceOptions.description: A low-maintenance, durable option available in white and other colors, perfect for horse paddocks and decorative enclosures.

serviceOptions.title: Custom Gates
serviceOptions.description: Ensure easy access with durable, custom gates designed for tractors, vehicles, and livestock movement.

benefits.title: Versatile Solutions
benefits.description: Whether you need to secure large livestock, small animals, or crop areas, our options can be customized to meet your unique requirements.

benefits.title: Durable Materials
benefits.description: From treated wood and vinyl to woven wire and steel, our materials are chosen to withstand the elements and farm life.

benefits.title: Property Value
benefits.description: Well-built farm fencing enhances the appearance and value of your property while serving a functional purpose.

benefits.title: Safety and Security
benefits.description: Protect your animals and equipment with sturdy fences designed to deter trespassers and keep livestock contained.

faqs.question: What is the best fencing for horses?
faqs.answer: Split rail or vinyl ranch fencing are popular choices for horses as they are visible and safe. Woven wire with a top sight board is also effective.

faqs.question: Do you install electronic gates for farms?
faqs.answer: Yes, we can install custom gates with automation options to make accessing your property easier.

faqs.question: How long does farm fencing last?
faqs.answer: With proper installation and materials like pressure-treated wood or vinyl, your farm fence can last for decades.
